ygData.subject: SK tips, tricks, guides, and quests
ygData.msgSnippet: I am helping the people at soerbaird.com (They host the shaman s crucible, an excellent shaman site) to put up a section on SK s. I m putting together alot of
ygData.messageBody:
I am helping the people at soerbaird.com (They host the shaman's
crucible, an excellent shaman site) to put up a section on SK's.
I'm putting together alot of stuff, but am looking for any tips,
tricks, spell advice, strategy, guides, rp info, and quests that
you all have out there. I will compile it, giving credit to
submitters, and get it onto the site, which from what I've seen
will top any of the few sk pages out there.

You can either mail me directly, or just post it to the list.
Hopefully the site will be ready enough to post the url soon.

Thanks for the help,
Xilith
